name: Ransomware Attack Chain Generator
description: Analyze a realistic ransomware attack timeline following MITRE ATT&CK framework. Detect, respond, and score each attack stage.
hints: Follow the attack timeline sequentially through all 6 stages
Each stage has unique artifacts: logs, commands, and files
Submit flags after completing each stage to unlock the next
Points are awarded based on detection and response timing
learning_objectives: Understand MITRE ATT&CK framework for ransomware attacks
Learn to analyze attack timelines and artifacts
Identify attack stages: Initial Access, Execution, Persistence, Lateral Movement, Exfiltration, Impact
